special_text:
[i](Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.)[/i]
When [i]In The Wyrm's Clutches[/i] enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.
{1}{R} Page 117
Whenever a Dragon you control dies, it deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature, planeswalker, or battle.
{2}{R} Page 279
Whenever one or more Dragons you control attack, [i]In The Wyrm's Clutches[/i] deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.
